QUESTION 58) Many countries are characterized by having multiethnic populations. Often they have evolved in this way over centuries. Other societies have become multiethnic faster, as a result of policies encouraging migration, or because of colonial and imperial legacies. From the point of view of the functioning of contemporary democracies, the model of society described demand, simultaneously,
A) Defense of patriotism and rejection of hybridism.
B) Universalization of rights and respect for diversity.
C) segregation of territory and stimulation of self -government.
D) Compensation policies and language homogenization.
E) standardization of culture and repression of particularisms.
